title: La guerra infinita 01 Kosovo - The Infinite War with English sub
description:
This folder consists of:

1. .avi file -- la guerra infinita 01 - kosovo.avi	
This is the same file that is already available for torrent download at mininova torrent site. If you have downloaded this earlier you can uncheck it

2. .sub file - la guerra infinita 01 - kosovo.sub
This is subtitle file for English translation

3. The_Infinite_War Full Transcript in English.doc
This is full transcript of the episode in English

4. Read Me.doc file with instructions how to use subtitles, if you are not familiar with that.

After nine years of International Community's presence in Kosovo the situation does not at all look bright to Riccado Iacona, a RAI TRE journalist, who interviews both Serbs and Albanians about the crimes of the KLA (Kosovo Liberation Army).
